author: Megan Ellis
title: [Pics] The world's ultimate destinations
text:
Credit: flickr.com/ SF Brit 
Top travel guide publisher Lonely Planet has announced the top destinations in its Ultimate Travelist 2015, which names the world's must-visit destinations. 
Coming out on top are the Temples of Angkor in Cambodia, which include Angkor Wat. 
Angkor Wat was listed as the world's top-rated landmark by TripAdvisor. You can see the other top-rated landmarks here . 
In second place on Lonely Planet's list is the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, which is followed in third place by Machu Picchu in Peru. 
The usual suspects make it into the top ten, such as the Great Wall of China, the Grand Canyon and the Taj Mahal. 
While you may not agree on the rankings, we can agree that all of these places are beautiful. 
Have a look at Lonely Planet's top ten destinations below: 
1. Temples of Angkor, Cambodia
